messages.content:
Hello Alex,

I’m excited to submit my proposal for the Mobile App Redesign project. With over 5 years of experience in UI/UX design and a strong command of Figma and user research, I have successfully delivered high‑impact designs for e‑commerce and SaaS platforms.

I’m proud to share that I was recently awarded the **Best UX Design 2024** distinction by the International Design Awards, recognizing my ability to create intuitive and engaging user experiences.

Given the scope and my recent award, I propose a competitive hourly rate of **$58** (slightly below the market average of $60) to ensure high‑quality deliverables while staying within your budget.

I’m available to start immediately and can meet the December 31, 2024 deadline. Let’s discuss how I can bring my award‑winning design approach to your mobile app.

Best regards,
Jane Doe
Portfolio: https://myportfolio.com/jane-doe
